item.title: Automating Kubernetes with Saltstack
item.description: Intro I’ve been looking to get better with infrastructure automation and container orchestration so as a learning exercise I wanted to setup a Kubernetes cluster that is deployed in an automated way from Saltstack. Overview My goal for this project was to setup and manage a Kubernetes cluster using Saltstack, the idea being that since I wanted to learn them both if I could automate the setup of the cluster I’d be killing two birds with one stone.
